channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Pretty Url
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Pretty Url

item.title: CVE-2023-2009|2024-08-02T06:05:27.096Z -- unknown -- pretty%20url
item.description: Plugin does not sanitize and escape the URL field in the Pretty Url WordPress plugin through 1.5.4 settings, which could allow high-privilege users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
